channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Anti-Trump protesters turn out for rallies in New York, Washington, D.C., and other cities nationwide
item.description: Opponents of President Donald Trump's administration took to the streets to decry what they see as threats to the nation's democratic ideals.

item.title: White House claims letter to Harvard with demands was an 'unauthorized' mistake: NYT
item.description: The April 11 letter set off a public feud between the White House and Harvard University.

item.title: U.S. and Iran say talks over Tehran's nuclear program make progress and set plans for more
item.description: Iran and the U.S. will begin having experts meet to discuss details of a possible deal over Tehran's rapidly advancing nuclear program.

item.title: U.S. Supreme Court temporarily blocks deportations of Venezuelan migrants under wartime law
item.description: The U.S. Supreme Court early on Saturday paused President Donald Trump's administration from deporting Venezuelan men in immigration custody.

item.title: 99% of the ‘biggest winning stocks’ share this criteria, says investing legend
Trump to reclassify many federal workers, making them easier to fire
item.description: Trump to reclassify many federal workers, making them easier to fire.

item.title: The ‘smart money’ index is acting unusual. It could be a buying opportunity.
Why Trump Media once again called out ‘naked short selling’ as its stock dropped
Why silver could finally be a better investment opportunity than gold
Trump won’t fire Powell — but he could still pressure the Fed. Here's how.
